channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Streetlights not working, 22nd April
item.description:
Two Streetlights not working at the junction of Welch Road / Howell Road in Cheltenham. The columns are marked 4 and 5.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 93, Welch Road, Kingsditch, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Street lights not working in Hillands Drive, 22nd April
item.description:
Outside No 5 Hillands Drive plus rest of road not working
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 5, Hillands Drive, Leckhampton, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Large amount of broken glass, 22nd April
item.description:
There's a lot of broken glass on the pavement and road which could seriously injure an animal. Please could it be cleaned up - thanks

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 12-14, Bath Road, Montpellier, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: No street lights pilley crescent, 22nd April
item.description:
No street lights working on pilley crescent
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 58, Pilley Crescent, Leckhampton, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Flytipping St George’s Place, 22nd April
item.description:
Mattresses and other soft furnishing at the entrance to the Euro car park, next to 16 St George’s Place. This is a regular flytipping spot, but some of it may be on private land

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 16, Saint Georges Place, Ewens Farm, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Large piece of foam flytipped Chester Walk, 22nd April
item.description:
A large (mattress size) piece of foam has been flytipped on the entrance to Chester Walk from St George’s Place (at the back of the library)

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Clarence Street, Ewens Farm, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: The queues to the Air Balloon roundabout are resulting in increased litter on the verges. This is an AONB and an Ancient Woodlland., 22nd April
item.description:
Verges on A436 leading up to the Air Balloon roundabout from Star Golf Club.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): A436, Coberley, Cotswold
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Fan and cd units fly tipped, 22nd April
item.description:
Today, Tuesday 22 April, 2x cd/shelving units and an electric fan were fly tipped by the Terry Ruck Close cut through
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 9, Heapey Close, Fiddler's Green, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: 10 inch pothole outside number 3-5, 22nd April
item.description:
There is a large pothole outside number 3-5 Great Western Terrance and many other slightly smaller ones further up the road. Because of the parked cars either side of the road, there is limited scope to avoid the holes when driving
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 12, Great Western Terrace, Alstone, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Streetlamp covered with climbing vegetation, 22nd April
item.description:
Next to electricity transformer. Nearest house 2 Great Western Terrace. The same problem happened last year but the vegetation from the light itself was cleared and not from the lamp post itself, so it soon grew back again
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 2, Great Western Terrace, Alstone, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Fridge freezers trailer full of rubbish, 22nd April
item.description:
This trailer has been on the road for around 6 months it is full of rubbish spilling onto the road and pavement. Please remove this as soon as possible
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 33;35;37;39;41;43, Newton Road, Kingsditch, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: TMC - Defects -CW6 Potholes problem, 22nd April
item.description:
28 day with give an take plus 15. Minutes delay boards needed carriageway pothole 1000x600x40mm tarmac patch required best out of hours number1 (CW6 Pothole)
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: TMC - Defects - Other FW6 Surface problem, 22nd April
item.description:
28 day with give an take plus temporary footway closure needed footway abrupt level difference 1200x500x25mm tarmac patch required stats required (FW6 Abrupt Level Differences)

item.title: TMC - Defects -CW6 Potholes problem, 22nd April
item.description:
Pothole CW ENWD 900mm x 600mm x 60mm Road Closure TM Entrance to Esso Temporary road closure (CW6 Pothole)
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Tree is damaged problem, 22nd April
item.description:
FMS report passed to Highways by CBC - Large cracks forming in wall from street planted tree roots. Bournside Close, there are a group of 4 trees that are overgrown and have created large cracks to garden wall due to tree roots. There is also another tree alongside our driveway on Bournside Close that is now leaning towards our property. All these trees belong to the council.
Report on FixMyStreet
